text: Dead Ringers is a 1988 Canadian American psychological thriller movie directed by David Cronenberg and was based on the novel Twins by Bari Wood and Jack Geasland. It stars Jeremy Irons, Genevi√®ve Bujold, Shirley Douglas, Stephen Lack, Jill Hennessy, Jacqueline Hennessy and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 thriller movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by David Cronenberg
